learning_data.phrase: How do you say 'My name is...'?
How do you say 'My name is...'?
How do you say 'My name is...'?

learning_data.translation: Inu mi dun lati pade yin
Ṣe o le sọ pe kaaro?

learning_data.phrase: How do you say 'My name is...'?
learning_data.translation: Bawo ni o ṣe sọ 'Orukọ mi ni...'?
Ṣe o le ran mi lọwọ?
Aaargh (no direct equivalent, often just a gesture or silence)
Shangazi (father's sister), Mama mdogo (mother's younger sister), Mama mkubwa (mother's elder sister)
Mjomba (mother's brother), Baba mdogo (father's younger brother), Baba mkubwa (father's elder brother)
Fanya mazoezi ya maneno ya familia

learning_data.phrase: How do you say 'My name is...'?

learning_data.translation: Fanya mazoezi ya viunganishi vya mahali
Ongea kuhusu ratiba ya kila siku
